name: Streadata.io API Gallery - The Guardian
description: This is a repository of the guardian APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: The Guardian
apis.description: The Guardian is a British national daily newspaper which has grown into a national paper associated with a complex organisational structure and an international multimedia and web presence. The Guardian provides API access to articles accessible by tag and section, and a suite of open source data and tools. The Guardian makes content accessible to increase traffic, brand awareness, and as a marketing vehicle, including partnership opportunities via platform program.
